Would you like to go through again from Squeeze mode
Would you like to go through again from Relax mode
The SPHINCTER PRESSURE values of interest, are,
\u2022 RESTING - applied by the un-contracted muscle
\u2022 SQUEEZE - maximum force applied during the test
\u2022 AVERAGE SQUEEZE - Endurance of Squeeze, average, after 10 secs of Squeeze
\u2022 COUGH ANAL REFLEX - to ascertain, the Anal Contraction, during a Cough
Normal Range of Sphincter Pressure Values
1. The test will go through various modes, like, REST, SQUEEZE, and COUGH ANAL REFLEX
2. User can Select the Time, for each Test,
3. User can also Repeat modes ( SQUEEZE and COUGH)
4. Once the Test is started, User has to go through, the REST, SQUEEZE, and COUGH ANAL REFLEX modes
5. User can only skip the Repeat, SQUEEZE, and COUGH modes
1. To determine, the RESTING PRESSURE, wait for 10 seconds after inserting the SENSOR.
2. Press, the REST key, a Green graph, showing the RESTING pressure values, will appear.
3. The next, measure, SQUEEZE PRESSURE, will be chosen automatically.
4. Ask the Patient, to contract the Sphincter muscle to a maximum of 10 secs and then Press the SQUEEZE key, a RED GRAPH with values will appear.
5. The device also calculates, the AVERAGE SQUEEZE pressure over 10 secs
6. Finally, Press the COUGH REFLEX Key, and ask the Patient to COUGH, a YELLOW GRAPH with Values will appear
